name: Dyna jump
description:
Game info

Dyna jump is endless runner were your goal keep flying upward as much as you can. You got a lot of obstacles to dodge, from planes to ufos

Power ups

There is 5 types of power ups in the game

  • Heath back
    • Give x amount of health back if any health is missing.
  • Armor back
    • Give x amount of armor back if any armor is missing.
  • Immortality
    • makes you immortal for all obstacles for 5 seconds
  • TNT crate
    • Will clear the whole board, power ups and coin. But will give you x amount of coins and special coins in return aswell
  • Black hole
    • Black hole will shut you into a blackhole were you are inside for 10 seconds, when your inside your highcounter will not move but there will be raining with a lot of coins. When the 10 seconds is done you will give out and got 1km on the highcounter
Shop

The ingame shop got 2 types of tabs normal shop and our special shop

You are able to buy upgrade from this shop with the coins picked up in the game.

  • Normal shop
    • Strongere explosion
    • Better shield
    • lower cooldown on dynamite recharger
    • strongere start explosion to get highere up
    • More dynamite in store
    • Aero dynamic, makes you fly for a longere amount of time from a explosion
  • Special shop - same type of upgrade just strongere than normal shop
    • Strongere explosion
    • Better shield
    • lower cooldown on dynamite recharger
    • strongere start explosion to get highere up
    • More dynamite in store
    • Aero dynamic, makes you fly for a longere amount of time from a explosion
Coming features
  • Skins for the player
  • New power ups
  • New types of enimes
